div.class: paceflow-card-item paceflow-card-item--right-down paceflow-card-item--outline paceflow-shadow paceflow-card--header-action paceflow-card-item--selected

col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-5 d-flex flex-column justify-content-center align-items-center my-5

partner_name

option.t-att-selected: country.id == int(country_id) if country_id else country.id == partner.country_id.id
